verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H4256>companies<s%> that <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> by <S%H4256>course,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over the <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over the <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and the <S%H8269>stewards<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7399>substance<s%> and <S%H4735>possession<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> with the <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and with the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, and with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> men, to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up on his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> me, my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and my <S%H5971>people:<s%> As for me, I had in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4496>rest<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for the <S%H1916>footstool<s%> <S%H7272><s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> and had made <S%H3559>ready<s%> for the <S%H1129>building:<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have been a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

However, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> me before <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H25>father<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> for he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to be the <S%H5057>ruler;<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H25>father;<s%> and among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H25>father<s%> he <S%H7521>liked<s%> me to make me <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And of <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> (for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%>) he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> and my <S%H2691>courts:<s%> for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> him to be my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and I will be his <S%H25>father.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H2388>constant<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H1875>seek<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> that you may <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5157>leave<s%> it for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And you, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> you the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H25>father,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with a <S%H2655>willing<s%> <S%H5315>mind:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1875>searches<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> and <S%H995>understands<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3336>imaginations<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H1875>seek<s%> him, he will be <S%H4672>found<s%> of you; but <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him, he will <S%H2186>cast<s%> you off for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

<S%H7200>Take<s%> <S%H7200>heed<s%> <S%H6258>now;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H197>porch,<s%> and of the <S%H1004>houses<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H1597>treasuries<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chambers<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2315>parlors<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat,

And the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had by the <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, of the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and of the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H6944>dedicated<s%> things:

Also for the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

He gave of <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for things of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H5656>service;<s%> silver also for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> kind of <S%H5656>service:<s%>

Even the <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and for their <S%H5216>lamps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> and for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof: and for the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> both for the <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> and also for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H5656>use<s%> of every <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>

And by <S%H4948>weight<s%> he gave <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of show <S%H4635>bread,<s%> for every <S%H7979>table;<s%> and likewise <S%H3701>silver<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%>

Also <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the meat <S%H4207>hooks,<s%> and the <S%H4219>bowls,<s%> and the <S%H7184>cups:<s%> and for the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> he gave gold by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>basin;<s%> and likewise silver by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>basin<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%>

And for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight;<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> that <S%H6566>spread<s%> out their wings, and <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the covenant of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> this, said David, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made me <S%H7919>understand<s%> in <S%H3791>writing<s%> by his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on me, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>works<s%> of this <S%H8403>pattern.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> it: <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> even my <S%H430>God,<s%> will be with you; he will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even they shall be with you for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and there shall be with you for <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H2451>skillful<s%> man, for <S%H3605>any<s%> manner of <S%H5656>service:<s%> also the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> will be <S%H3605>wholly<s%> at your <S%H1697>commandment.<s%>
